dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, we gotta talk about Kanye West, right? Like, he's apparently still on this presidential run thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, we gotta talk about Kanye West, right? Like, he's apparently still on this presidential run thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, God, yeah. I saw some headlines. Is he *actually* running? Or is this, like, a performance art piece?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, God, yeah. I saw some headlines. Is he actually running? Or is this, like, a performance art piece?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, according to reports, he's actually indicated he's doing it specifically to, you know, siphon votes away from Joe Biden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, according to reports, he's actually indicated he's doing it specifically to, you know, siphon votes away from Joe Biden.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the billionaire rap superstar indicated, in an interview by text today, that he was in fact running to siphon votes from the presumptive Democratic nominee, Joe Biden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Okay. I mean, he's not even *running* running, though, is he? I remember him saying he's like, "walking" to win? [overlaps]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Okay. I mean, he's not even running running, though, is he? I remember him saying he's like, walking to win?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about that directly, West said that rather than running for president, he was walking, quickly adding that he was walking . . . to win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, he did! "Walking... to win." But then when he was pressed on the fact he *can't* actually win – not enough ballots, write-in impossible – he just kinda said, "I'm not going to argue with you. Jesus is King."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he did! Walking to win. But then when he was pressed on the fact he can't actually win - not enough ballots, write-in impossible - he just kinda said, I'm not going to argue with you. Jesus is King.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When it was pointed out that he actually cant win in 2020that he wont be on enough ballots to yield 270 electoral votes, and that a write-in campaign isnt feasibleand thus was serving as a spoiler, West replied: Im not going to argue with you. Jesus is King.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. That's... a response. So, are these, like, Republican operatives, you know, trying to get him on the ballot? Because that's what I heard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. That's... a response. So, are these, like, Republican operatives, you know, trying to get him on the ballot? Because that's what I heard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amid various reports that Republican and Trump-affiliated political operatives are trying to get Kanye West onto various state ballots for Novembers presidential election...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He wouldn't clarify that. He basically rebuffed all questions about who's driving his ballot access. But he *does* seem to have a continuing relationship with the White House, apparently meeting with Betsy DeVos about curriculum for a school he's designing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He wouldn't clarify that. He basically rebuffed all questions about who's driving his ballot access. But he does seem to have a continuing relationship with the White House, apparently meeting with Betsy DeVos about curriculum for a school he's designing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West rebuffed various attempts to clarify who was driving his ballot access or strategy... West says that hes designing a school within the next month and that Im meeting with Betsy DeVos about the post-Covid curriculum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Betsy DeVos? Wow. And Trump, didn't Trump say something like, "I like Kanye very much," but then claimed he had nothing to do with it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Betsy DeVos? Wow. And Trump, didn't Trump say something like, I like Kanye very much, but then claimed he had nothing to do with it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I like Kanye very much, President Trump told reporters at the White House yesterday. No, I have nothing to do with him getting on the ballot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But those reports from CNN and New York Times are pretty specific about GOP operatives trying to get him on ballots in pivotal states, like Wisconsin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But those reports from C N N and New York Times are pretty specific about G O P operatives trying to get him on ballots in pivotal states, like Wisconsin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests intentions have come under increased scrutiny this week, following reports by CNN, New York, the New York Times and others, about efforts by GOP political operatives to get him onto several ballots, including states like Wisconsin that could be pivotal in deciding the next president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he's been, like, a vocal Trump supporter forever, hadn't he? I mean, texts from him apparently ended with "Trump 2020" and a raised fist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he's been, like, a vocal Trump supporter forever, hadn't he? I mean, texts from him apparently ended with Trump twenty twenty and a raised fist.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West has been a vocal Trump supporter, including visiting the president in the Oval Office. Texts from West to me earlier this summer repeatedly ended with the sign-off Trump 2020, and a fist raised high.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for a long time. And, you know, obviously, there's been a lot of concern about his mental health, his bipolar disorder, and whether he's actually, uh, being used here. He didn't answer that question, by the way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for a long time. And, you know, obviously, there's been a lot of concern about his mental health, his bipolar disorder, and whether he's actually, uh, being used here. He didn't answer that question, by the way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests recent actions have also drawn public focus, given his bipolar disorderand many, including his wife, Kim Kardashian-West, have expressed concern about his mental health. ... West did not respond when asked whether he feels hes being used.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's rough. And the whole "God production" thing for his slapdash ballot operation, that just feels... like a deflection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's rough. And the whole God production thing for his slapdash ballot operation, that just feels... like a deflection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot... didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. I mean, remember his "Birthday Party" platform from the Forbes interview? Pro-life, anti-vax theories, Wakanda management style...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. I mean, remember his Birthday Party platform from the Forbes interview? Pro-life, anti-vax theories, Wakanda management style...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank... a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And he said he was *dumping* Trump then, didn't he? Like, "taking the red hat off" because Trump "hid in the bunker." But then he still praised Trump for letting God be part of the conversation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And he said he was dumping Trump then, didn't he? Like, taking the red hat off because Trump hid in the bunker. But then he still praised Trump for letting God be part of the conversation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In that interview, West also claimed that he was dumping Trump. I am taking the red hat off, with this interview. His reason: It looks like one big mess to me. I dont like that I caught wind that he hid in the bunker. ... Trump is the closest president weve had in years to allowing God to still be part of the conversation, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Super contradictory. But he was, uh, very clear he's comfortable doing damage to Biden's chances.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Super contradictory. But he was, uh, very clear he's comfortable doing damage to Biden's chances.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And West was eager to criticize Biden, and expressed comfort with the idea of doing damage to the former vice presidents White House chances. Im not denying it; I just told you.

dialogue_turns.text: So, it's basically, you know, a very confusing, potentially coordinated effort to just... cause chaos, politically.
